uberEatsHint.title: How to find your ID
uberEatsHint.step1: Log in to your <0>Uber Eats Restaurant Manager</0>
uberEatsHint.step2: The UUID is mentioned in the URL. The example is as below: <0/> https://restaurant.uber.com/home/<1>be77dfif-49e5-4a96-y234-98f6f55af43d</1>
uberEatsHint.ifDoesntWork: If you can't find it or if it doesn't work, please contact us at <0>support@foodetective.co</0>
